24 #include <stdio.h>

27 #include "bgpdump_lib.h"
28 #include "bgpdump_process.h"
29 
30 #include "bgpstream_record.h"
31 #include "bgpstream_elem_generator.h"
32 #include "bgpstream_debug.h"
33 
34 /* allocate memory for a bs_record */
35 bgpstream_record_t *bgpstream_record_create() {
36  bgpstream_debug("BS: create record start");
37  bgpstream_record_t *bs_record;
38  if((bs_record =
39  (bgpstream_record_t*)malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_record_t))) == NULL) {
40  return NULL; // can't allocate memory
41  }
42 
43  bs_record->bd_entry = NULL;
44 
45  if((bs_record->elem_generator = bgpstream_elem_generator_create()) == NULL) {
46  bgpstream_record_destroy(bs_record);
47  return NULL;
48  }
49 
50  bgpstream_record_clear(bs_record);
51 
52  bgpstream_debug("BS: create record end");
53  return bs_record;
54 }
55 
56 /* free memory associated to a bs_record */
57 void bgpstream_record_destroy(bgpstream_record_t * const bs_record){
58  bgpstream_debug("BS: destroy record start");
59  if(bs_record == NULL) {
60  bgpstream_debug("BS: record destroy end");
61  return; // nothing to do
62  }
63  if(bs_record->bd_entry != NULL){
64  bgpstream_debug("BS - free bs_record->bgpdump_entry");
65  bgpdump_free_mem(bs_record->bd_entry);
66  bs_record->bd_entry = NULL;
67  }
68 
69  if(bs_record->elem_generator != NULL) {
70  bgpstream_elem_generator_destroy(bs_record->elem_generator);
71  bs_record->elem_generator = NULL;
72  }
73 
74  bgpstream_debug("BS - free bs_record");
75  free(bs_record);
76  bgpstream_debug("BS: destroy record end");
77 }
78 
79 void bgpstream_record_clear(bgpstream_record_t *record) {
80  record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_EMPTY_SOURCE;
81  record->dump_pos = BGPSTREAM_DUMP_START;
82  record->attributes.dump_project[0] = '\0';
83  record->attributes.dump_collector[0] = '\0';
84  record->attributes.dump_type = BGPSTREAM_UPDATE;
85  record->attributes.dump_time = 0;
86  record->attributes.record_time = 0;
87 
88  if(record->bd_entry != NULL) {
89  bgpdump_free_mem(record->bd_entry);
90  record->bd_entry = NULL;
91  }
92 
93  bgpstream_elem_generator_clear(record->elem_generator);
94 }
95 
96 void bgpstream_record_print_mrt_data(bgpstream_record_t * const bs_record) {
97  bgpdump_print_entry(bs_record->bd_entry);
98 }
99 
100 bgpstream_elem_t *bgpstream_record_get_next_elem(bgpstream_record_t *record) {
101  if(bgpstream_elem_generator_is_populated(record->elem_generator) == 0 &&
102  bgpstream_elem_generator_populate(record->elem_generator, record) != 0)
103  {
104  return NULL;
105  }
106  return bgpstream_elem_generator_get_next_elem(record->elem_generator);
107 }
